GARETH JOHNS DESIGN + DEVELOPMENT TEAM

Gareth Johns
Design + Development
@garethjohnsabc


TECHNOLOGY
----------

Siteleaf - Content management system
siteleaf.com

Foundation - Front-end framework
foundation.zurb.com

Jekyll - Static site generator
jekyllrb.com

Sass - CSS pre-processor
sass-lang.com

Liquid - Templating
shopify.github.io/liquid

GitHub - Code collaboration & hosting
github.com

JavaScript libraries include:
jQuery


TOOLS
-----

Coda - Text editor
panic.com/coda/

Sketch - Graphics editor
sketchapp.com

Illustrator & Photoshop - Graphics editor
adobe.com

Slack - Emojis and GIFs
slack.com
